segments.text: We're interested in your Drawn Works . What about the supply position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For most of the articles in the catalog , we have good supply .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's our inquiry list . You'll find the required items , specifications and quantities all there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . I'll look into it and let you have our firm offers tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't need to remind you that the market has become very competitive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll find our prices very favorable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's fine . By the way , do you quote FOB or CIF ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Either can be done , though we usually quote on CIF basis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then would you please make your prices CIF including five percent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . We can work them out for you .
segments.speaker: S2
